commands.command: SELECT CompanyName, CustomerID FROM CustomersTbl GROUP BY CompanyName HAVING COUNT(CompanyName)>1
SELECT CustomerID, CustomerID FROM CustomersAccInfoTbl GROUP BY CustomerID HAVING COUNT(CustomerID)>1
UPDATE CustomersTbl SET CompanyName = CompanyName & CustomerID WHERE CompanyName IN ( SELECT CompanyName FROM CustomersTbl GROUP BY CompanyName HAVING COUNT(CompanyName)>1)
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(CustomerID) AS CountCompanyIDS FROM CustomersAccInfoTbl GROUP BY CustomerID HAVING COUNT(CustomerID)>1
ALTER TABLE CustomersAccInfoTbl ADD CONSTRAINT UCID_CustomerID UNIQUE (CustomerID)
ALTER TABLE CustomersTbl ADD CONSTRAINT UCCN_CompanyName UNIQUE (CompanyName)
